Author: princess-kitty-belle
Text: I think the general idea is that you need to heal the body first and the mind will catch up (and it kinda has in my case). Also I think they say that the brain actually can't make the new connections needed in therapy if it isn't getting proper nourishment.

Author: whaleterweight
Text: Your BMI is very low, and it is quite possible that they are concerned that waiting any longer will put you in more danger. The priority is getting you medically stable, then working on the psychological side to maintain it. Does that make sense? I know it sounds awful, but remember that your ED is skewing your reality.   Congratulations on taking steps toward recovery! We are all rooting for you.
